title: Coronation chicken pasta salad
ingredients: ['250g pasta shells', '500g chopped poached chicken breast meat', '60g diced celery', '160g seedless green grapes, halved', 'salt to taste', '1/4 teaspoon ground white pepper', '5 tablespoons mayonnaise', '1/2 teaspoon curry powder', '1/4 teaspoon ground cumin', '2 tablespoons rice vinegar', '1 tablespoon caster sugar']
